Interface DeveloperRepository

All Known Implementing Classes:
JdbcDeveloperRepository, JpaDeveloperRepository
public interface DeveloperRepository
Repository interface for managing Developer entities. Follows the repository pattern to abstract the data access operations.

  • Method Details

    • findById

      Optional<Developer> findById(int id)
      Find a developer by its ID.
      Parameters:
      id - the developer ID
      Returns:
      an Optional containing the developer if found, empty otherwise

    • save

      Developer save(Developer developer)
      Save a new developer or update an existing one.
      Parameters:
      developer - the developer to save
      Returns:
      the saved developer

    • delete

      void delete(Developer developer)
      Delete a developer.
      Parameters:
      developer - the developer to delete

    • deleteById

      boolean deleteById(int id)
      Delete a developer by its ID.
      Parameters:
      id - the ID of the developer to delete
      Returns:
      true if the developer was deleted, false if not found

    • count

      long count()
      Count the total number of developers.
      Returns:
      the total number of developers

    • existsById

      boolean existsById(int id)
      Check if a developer with the given ID exists.
      Parameters:
      id - the developer ID
      Returns:
      true if the developer exists, false otherwise

    • countByCountryIgnoreCase

      long countByCountryIgnoreCase(String country)
      Count developers by country.
      Parameters:
      country - the country name
      Returns:
      the number of developers from the specified country

    • findAll

      Set<Developer> findAll()
      Returns all developers.
      Returns:
      a set of all developers
